text: Stepan Grigori Shakaryan (, 23 October 1935 – 22 June 2019) was an Armenian jazz and classical composer and pianist. He was awarded the People's Artist of the Republic of Armenia in 2017. He was a professor at Yerevan State Conservatory. He was born in Baku, Azerbaijan SSR. Shakaryan died on 22 June 2019 in Yerevan at the age of 83.Famous Armenian composer Stepan Shakaryan died ==Symphonic works== *Symphony N° 1 (Concert for orchestra, 1961) *Symphony N° 2 (choreographic symphony, 1965) *Symphony N° 3 (1975) *“Festival overture” (1995) *Symphonic orchestra “Armenia” (1991) *“Aria” (1982) ==References== Category:1935 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Armenian composers Category:Pianists
title: Stepan Shakaryan
